posts.message:
There's no news this week. There was no headlines, etc, or anything, really. Nothing that is news worthy for a headline started this week! However, tomorrow, Interactive Tuesday will happen, where I post about people's things, and headlines if there are any that early in the week, however, I doubt it.

In other news, Reviewers applications will be chosen soon! Also, check out the first Interactive Tuesday which can be found in this section. Tomorrow, I'll post a new one of that, with all new interactiveness.
posts.subject: [8/7-8/13] No news this week
